## KOBOLD

![](images/kobold.webp)

_Puny, scaled coyote-lizards that dwell underground._

**AC** 13 (leather), **HP** 1, **ATK** 1 spear (close/near) +0 (1d6), **MV** near, **S** -2 **D** 2 **C** 0 **I** -1 **W** 0 **Ch** -1, **AL** C, **LV** 0

**Dodge:** 1/day, an attack that would hit misses instead.
